betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Ores spawn on all planets and moons with there corresponding stone type.
§6
Overworld Stone Types :§l
Stone, 
Andesite, 
Granite,
Diorite,
Sandstone,
Red Sandstone,
Black Granite, 
Red Granite,
Marble,
Basalt
§f
Checking Jei will help you searching for ores. 
Ore veins also spawn tiny piles on the surface to make it easier to find them.
betterquesting:10.name:8: Fantastical Ores and where to find them
